name: lenegi
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Negative of both sides of 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1999.)
